title: Air all around us
brief_description: This film is designed to implement the study of air by developing the following concepts: air is all around us; air is a substance, ie it occupies space, and can be weighed; air exerts pressure from all sides; air expands when it is heated and contracts when it is cooled; air can be compressed.
